item.description:
Let's go for an evening/after-work sail and then raft-up at spectacle for drinks and a snack.

Who: People who love to sail. We need people who have boats or are members at clubs to bring a boat and volunteer to take some new crew. On your RSVP, please comment on whether you have a boat that you will sail or if you are looking to crew on a boat. Then, skippers can see the available crew and make arrangements. Hopefully, everybody will get on a boat.

When: Friday, July 17th. Skippers and crew will leave the dock or mooring whenever they choose and go for a sail. At 7:00 p.m. we will raft up at Spectacle Island for drinks and such. Folks will sail back whenever they choose. I plan to head out at 4 or 5, depending on what time crew members can get to the boat.

What: Sail with some new folks around the harbor islands and raft up at Spectacle Island.

Where: Various marina's, boat clubs, and Spectacle Island.

See you on the water!!!
item.name: Evening Sail and Rafting up at Spectacle Island
